acct_label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer), including liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Accounts Payable, Other, Current
acct_description: Amount of obligations incurred classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Accrued Income Taxes, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

acct_label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
acct_description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cumulative Changes in Net Gain (Loss) from Cash Flow Hedges, Effect Net of Tax
acct_description: Accumulated change, net of tax, in accumulated gains and losses from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges. Includes an entity's share of an equity investee's Increase or Decrease in deferred hedging gains or losses.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Tax
acct_description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
acct_description: Accumulated adjustment, net of tax, that results from the process of translating subsidiary financial statements and foreign equity investments into the reporting currency from the functional currency of the reporting entity, net of reclassification of realized foreign currency translation gains or losses.

acct_label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
acct_description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

acct_label: Additional Paid in Capital
acct_description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

acct_label: Adjustments, Noncash Items, to Reconcile Net Income (Loss) to Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Other (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
acct_description: Transactions that do not result in cash inflows or outflows in the period in which they occur, but affect net income and thus are removed when calculating net cash flow from operating activities using the indirect cash flow method. This element is used when there is not a more specific and appropriate element.

acct_label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Recognition and Exercise
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition and exercise of award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation
acct_description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit associated with share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes, but is not limited to, excess tax benefit.

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
acct_description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

acct_label: Alternative Investment
acct_description: Fair value of investment other than investment in equity security, investment in debt security and equity method investment. Includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Example includes, but is not limited to, investment in hedge fund, venture capital fund, private equity fund, and real estate partnership or fund.

acct_label: Alternative Investment, Fair Value Disclosure (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Fair value of investment in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Includes, but is not limited to, by unit, membership interest, or other ownership interest. Investment includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain hedge funds, venture capital funds, private equity funds, real estate partnerships or funds. Excludes measurement of net asset value as estimate of fair value.

acct_label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
acct_description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

acct_label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share, Options and Restrictive Stock Units
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of stock options or restrictive stock units (RSUs).

acct_label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
acct_description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

acct_label: Asset Impairment Charges
acct_description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

acct_label: Assets
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

acct_label: Assets, Current
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
acct_description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current, Other
acct_description: Amount of other assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Average Sales Prices
acct_description: The revenues derived from sales of oil or gas in each geographic area during the reporting period divided by the number of barrels of oil produced or thousands of cubic feet of gas produced.

acct_label: Bank Overdrafts
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of payments made in excess of existing cash balances, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the entity. Overdrafts generally have a very short time frame for correction or repayment and are therefore more similar to short-term bank financing than trade financing.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Earnings Per Share, Diluted
acct_description: The pro forma diluted net income per share for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Per Share, Diluted
acct_description: Per diluted share amount of pro forma income from continuing operations, after tax, as if the business combination had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Net Income (Loss)
acct_description: The pro forma net Income or Loss for the period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

acct_label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Revenue
acct_description: The pro forma revenue for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of the period.

acct_label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration Arrangements, Change in Amount of Contingent Consideration, Liability
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the value of a contingent consideration liability, including, but not limited to, differences arising upon settlement.

acct_label: Cash Acquired from Acquisition
acct_description: The cash inflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period (for example, cash that was held by the acquired business).

acct_label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
acct_description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

acct_label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

acct_label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
acct_description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: SEC Schedule, 12-04, Cash Dividends Paid to Registrant, Unconsolidated Subsidiaries
acct_description: This element represents disclosure of the aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by unconsolidated subsidiaries.

acct_label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Cash Paid
acct_description: Aggregate dividends paid during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

acct_label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
acct_description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

acct_label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
acct_description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

acct_label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
acct_description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

acct_label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
acct_description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

acct_label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
acct_description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

acct_label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
acct_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

acct_label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

acct_label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
acct_description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability
acct_description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
acct_description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

acct_label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
acct_description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

acct_label: Cost of Goods and Services Sold
acct_description: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

acct_label: Cost of Goods Sold (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total costs related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

acct_label: Cost of Revenue
acct_description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

acct_label: Cost of Services (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
acct_description: Total costs related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect of New Accounting Principle in Period of Adoption (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) to equity or (increase) decrease to net assets, resulting from the cumulative effect adjustment of a new accounting principle applied in the period of adoption.

acct_label: Cumulative Effect on Retained Earnings, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the cumulative effect on retained earnings net of related income tax effect.

acct_label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Current Foreign Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
acct_description: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Increase, Additional Borrowings (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: Increase of additional borrowings on existing and new debt instruments.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage
acct_description: Effective interest rate for the funds borrowed under the debt agreement considering interest compounding and original issue discount or premium.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage
acct_description: Percentage price of original principal amount of debt at which debt can be redeemed by the issuer.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Repurchased Face Amount
acct_description: Face (par) amount of the original debt instrument that was repurchased.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt discount.

acct_label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Premium
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt premium.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Cost (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of debt issuance costs (for example, but not limited to, legal, accounting, broker, and regulatory fees).

acct_label: Debt Issuance Costs Incurred During Noncash or Partial Noncash Transaction
acct_description: The amount of debt issuance costs that were incurred during a noncash or partial noncash transaction.

acct_label: Debt Related Commitment Fees and Debt Issuance Costs
acct_description: Represents the charge against earnings during the period for commitment fees and debt issuance expenses.

acct_label: Deconsolidation, Gain (Loss), Amount
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from deconsolidation of subsidiary and derecognition of group of assets constituting transfer of business or nonprofit activity, excluding conveyance of oil and gas mineral rights and transfer of good or service in contract with customer.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Distribution Paid
acct_description: Amount of distribution made to individual in accordance with deferred compensation arrangement.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Arrangement with Individual, Distributions Paid (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of distributions made to the individual during the period.

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Liability, Classified, Noncurrent
acct_description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements payable beyond one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).

acct_label: Deferred Compensation Plan Assets
acct_description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of assets held under deferred compensation agreements.

acct_label: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of deferred federal income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Costs, Gross
acct_description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

acct_label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
acct_description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

acct_label: Deferred Foreign Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
acct_description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

acct_label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
acct_description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

acct_label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Equity Method Investments
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from equity method investments.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Inventory
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from inventory.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
acct_description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
acct_description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Employee Compensation
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from employee compensation.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Pensions
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from pension benefits.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from accrued liabilities.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Self Insurance
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from estimated losses under self insurance.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Warranty Reserves
acct_description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from warranty reserves.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Expense from Stock Options Exercised
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax expense from write-off of the deferred tax asset related to deductible stock options at exercise.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
acct_description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Inventory
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax consequences attributable to taxable temporary differences derived from inventory.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Intangible Assets
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets other than goodwill.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Leasing Arrangements
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from leasing arrangements.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

acct_label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
acct_description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

acct_label: Liability, Defined Benefit Pension Plan, Noncurrent
acct_description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan, classified as noncurrent. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Gain (Loss), before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for gain (loss) of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Prior Service Cost (Credit), before Tax
acct_description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for cost (credit) of benefit change attributable to participants' prior service from plan amendment or plan initiation of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Increase (Decrease) for Actual Return (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from actual return (loss) determined by change in fair value of plan assets adjusted for contributions, benefit payments, and other expenses.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Actuarial Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from change in actuarial assumptions which (increases) decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Assumptions include, but are not limited to, interest, mortality, employee turnover, salary, and temporary deviation from substantive plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Actuarial Net (Gains) Losses (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The net increase or decrease of changes in the value of either the benefit obligation or the plan assets resulting from experience different from that assumed or from a change in an actuarial assumption, or the consequence of a decision to temporarily deviate from the substantive plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amortization of Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amortization of Prior Service Cost (Credit)
acct_description: Amount of prior service cost (credit) recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Amounts that Will be Amortized from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) in Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount in accumulated other comprehensive income expected to be recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost over the fiscal year that follows the most recent annual statement of financial position presented, including the net gain (loss), net prior service cost or credit, and net transition asset or obligation.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amount to be Amortized from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss) Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: Amount included in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) expected to be recognized as components of net periodic benefit cost for the fiscal year that follows the most recent annual statement of financial position, including gain (loss), prior service cost (credit), and transition asset (obligation).

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Benefit Obligation, Discount Rate
acct_description: Weighted average rate for present value of future retirement benefits cash flows, used to determine benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Benefit Obligation, Rate of Compensation Increase
acct_description: Weighted average rate increase of compensation, used to determine benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, pay-related defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Discount Rate
acct_description: Weighted average rate for present value of future retirement benefits cash flows, used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Expected Long-term Rate of Return on Plan Assets
acct_description: Weighted average rate of return on plan assets, reflecting average rate of earnings expected on existing plan assets and expected contributions, used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Rate of Compensation Increase
acct_description: Weighted average rate of compensation increase used to determine net periodic benefit cost of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, pay-related defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation
acct_description: Amount of actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Benefits Paid
acct_description: Amount of payment to participant of defined benefit plan which decreases benefit obligation. For pension plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, pension benefits and death benefits. For other postretirement plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefits Paid (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of payments made for which participants are entitled under a pension plan, including pension benefits, death benefits, and benefits due on termination of employment. Also includes payments made under a postretirement benefit plan, including prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services. This item represents a periodic decrease to the plan obligations and a decrease to plan assets.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Contributions by Employer
acct_description: Amount of contribution received by defined benefit plan from employer which increases plan assets.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Amortization, Next Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of cost (credit) included in accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss expected to be recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) for fiscal year following most recent annual statement of financial position.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Five Fiscal Years Thereafter (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the aggregate benefits expected to be paid in the five fiscal years thereafter (the aggregate amount of benefits expected to be paid in years 6 through 10 after the date of the latest statement of financial position).

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year Five (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 5.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year Four (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 4.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year One (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 1.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year Three (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 3.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year Two (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 2.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year One
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Return (Loss) on Plan Assets
acct_description: Amount of expected return (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit, calculated based on expected long-term rate of return and market-related value of plan assets of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Amount
acct_description: Amount of asset segregated and restricted to provide benefit under defined benefit plan. Asset includes, but is not limited to, stock, bond, other investment, earning from investment, and contribution by employer and employee.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which (increases) decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Foreign Currency Exchange Rate Changes, Plan Assets (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of increase or decrease in plan assets attributed to foreign currency changes. The effects of foreign currency exchange rate changes that are to be disclosed are those applicable to plans of a foreign operation whose functional currency is not the reporting currency.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Funded (Unfunded) Status of Plan
acct_description: Amount of funded (unfunded) status of defined benefit plan, measured as difference between fair value of plan assets and benefit obligation. Includes, but is not limited to, overfunded (underfunded) status.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Interest Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost recognized for passage of time related to defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit)
acct_description: Amount of net periodic benefit cost (credit) for defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Other Cost (Credit)
acct_description: Amount of defined benefit plan cost (credit), classified as other.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, Increase (Decrease) for Plan Amendment
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from change in terms of existing plan or initiation of new plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Benefits Paid
acct_description: Amount of payment to participant under defined benefit plan which decreases plan assets. For pension plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, pension benefits and death benefits. For other postretirement plan, payment includes, but is not limited to, prescription drug benefits, health care benefits, life insurance benefits, and legal, educational and advisory services.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) plan assets of defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Service Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost for actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, (Increase) Decrease for Settlement
acct_description: Amount of (increase) decrease to benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk for obligation and assets used to effect settlement. Includes, but is not limited to, lump-sum cash payment to participant in exchange for right to receive specified benefits, purchase of nonparticipating annuity contract and change from remeasurement.

acct_label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Payment for Settlement
acct_description: Amount of payment, which decreases plan assets of defined benefit plan, for irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk for obligation and assets used to effect settlement. Transaction constituting settlement includes, but is not limited to, making lump-sum cash payment to participant in exchange for their rights to receive specified benefits and purchasing nonparticipating annuity contract.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost
acct_description: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Discretionary Contribution Amount
acct_description: Amount of discretionary contributions made by an employer to a defined contribution plan.

acct_label: Depreciation
acct_description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

acct_label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
acct_description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

acct_label: Derivative Assets (Liabilities), at Fair Value, Net
acct_description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

acct_label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

acct_label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise stock options, restrictive stock units (RSUs), convertible preferred stock of an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), and other dilutive convertible securities.

acct_label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax
acct_description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

acct_label: Dividends, Common Stock, Cash
acct_description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

acct_label: Dividends Payable, Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The aggregate amount of dividends declared, but not paid, as of the financial reporting date.

acct_label: Dividends Payable, Current
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Dividends Payable
acct_description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
acct_description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the income tax rates.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Qualified Production Activity, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for qualified production activity.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to statutory income tax expense (benefit) outside of the country of domicile.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible expenses.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to impairment loss.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to state and local income tax expense (benefit), net of federal tax expense (benefit).

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Percent
acct_description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income tax contingencies. Includes, but not limited to, domestic tax contingency, foreign tax contingency, state and local tax contingency, and other contingencies.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash and Cash Equivalents
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) from the effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalent balances held in foreign currencies.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash and Cash Equivalents, Continuing Operations
acct_description: The effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in continuing operations held in foreign currencies.

acct_label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies. Excludes amounts for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

acct_label: Effect of Fourth Quarter Events, Amount (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of the item included in the fourth quarter that affected period-to-period comparability (excluding restatement adjustments), or the extraordinary item or unusual or infrequent item recognized in the fourth quarter in the absence of either a fourth-quarter report or disclosure in the annual report for the fourth quarter.

acct_label: Effect of LIFO Inventory Liquidation on Income
acct_description: The effect of liquidating LIFO (last in first out) inventory layers on income.

acct_label: Employee-related Liabilities, Current
acct_description: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

acct_label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, Tax Benefit
acct_description: Amount of tax benefit for recognition of expense of award under share-based payment arrangement.

acct_label: Excess of Replacement or Current Costs over Stated LIFO Value
acct_description: The excess of replacement or current cost over the stated LIFO (last in first out) inventory value when the LIFO inventory method is utilized.

acct_label: Excess Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation, Financing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash inflow from realized tax benefit related to deductible compensation cost reported on the entity's tax return for equity instruments in excess of the compensation cost for those instruments recognized for financial reporting purposes.

acct_label: Extended Product Warranty Accrual, Increase for Warranties Issued
acct_description: Amount of increase in the extended product warranty accrual from warranties issued. Excludes standard product warranties.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
acct_description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: Aggregate amount of intangible asset amortization recognized as expense during the period.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
acct_description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Useful Life, Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The maximum useful life of a major finite-lived intangible asset class. A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.

acct_label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Useful Life, Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The minimum useful life of a major finite-lived intangible asset class. A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Earnings, Net
acct_description: The amount of net gains or losses on foreign currency cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Exchange Rate, Translation (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The foreign exchange rate used to translate amounts denominated in the functional currency to the reporting currency.

acct_label: Foreign Currency Exchange Rate, Translation
acct_description: Foreign exchange rate used to translate amounts denominated in functional currency to reporting currency.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Five (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year five of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Four (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year four of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year One (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year one of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Three (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year three of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Future Amortization Expense, Year Two (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
acct_description: The amount of amortization expense expected to be recognized during year two of the five succeeding fiscal years.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Derivatives Recorded in Earnings, Net
acct_description: Aggregate impact of foreign currency derivatives on earnings for the period. Includes impact of foreign currency cash flow hedge ineffectiveness and the ineffectiveness of fair value hedging derivatives and full change in fair value of the foreign currency derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
acct_description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Hedging Activity
acct_description: Gain (loss) incurred in hedging activities.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Business
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.

acct_label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
acct_description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

acct_label: Goodwill
acct_description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
acct_description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

acct_label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
acct_description: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

acct_label: Goodwill, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
acct_description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) an asset representing future economic benefits from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Gross
acct_description: Amount before accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Impaired, Accumulated Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
acct_description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Transfers
acct_description: Amount of transfers into (out of) an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Translation Adjustments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) from foreign currency translation adjustments of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Goodwill, Written off Related to Sale of Business Unit
acct_description: Amount of divestiture of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

acct_label: Gross Profit
acct_description: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

acct_label: Guarantor Obligations, Maximum Exposure, Undiscounted
acct_description: Maximum potential amount of future payments (undiscounted) the guarantor could be required to make under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees before reduction for potential recoveries under recourse or collateralization provisions.

acct_label: Guarantees, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of guarantee, including, but not limited to, financial standby letter of credit, fair value guarantee, guarantee of collection of scheduled contractual cash flows from financial assets, and contracts that contingently require the guarantor to make payments or perform services.

acct_label: Impairment Effect on Earnings Per Share, after Tax
acct_description: After tax earnings per share or per unit impact arising from asset impairment.

acct_label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Indefinite-lived (Excluding Goodwill)
acct_description: Amount of impairment loss resulting from write-down of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

acct_label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
acct_description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
acct_description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Foreign
acct_description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to foreign operations, which is defined as Income or Loss generated from operations located outside the entity's country of domicile.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
acct_description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

acct_label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
acct_description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

acct_label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
acct_description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

acct_label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
acct_description: The sum of the current income tax expense or benefit and the deferred income tax expense or benefit pertaining to pretax Income or Loss from continuing operations; income tax expense or benefit may include interest and penalties on tax uncertainties based on the entity's accounting policy.

acct_label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
acct_description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

acct_label: Income Taxes Receivable, Current
acct_description: Carrying amount due within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Impairment Losses, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible impairment loss.

acct_label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Restructuring Charges, Amount
acct_description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible restructuring charges.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Payable
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount due for taxes based on the reporting entity's earnings or attributable to the entity's income earning process (business presence) within a given jurisdiction.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Liabilities
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Asset
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Compensation
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligation created by employee agreements whereby earned compensation will be paid in the future.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to taxing authorities for taxes that are based on the reporting entity's earnings, net of amounts receivable from taxing authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes, and in deferred and other tax liabilities and assets.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Receivable, Related Parties
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed to the reporting entity in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
acct_description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of outstanding money paid in advance for goods or services that bring economic benefits for future periods.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables
acct_description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due within one year (or one operating cycle) from all parties, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

acct_label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
acct_description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

acct_label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
acct_description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

acct_label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
acct_description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

acct_label: Interest Expense
acct_description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

acct_label: Interest Expense, Other Long-term Debt
acct_description: Amount of interest expense incurred on long-term debt classified as other, including, but not limited to, interest on long-term notes and amortization of issuance costs.

acct_label: Interest Income (Expense), Nonoperating, Net
acct_description: The net amount of nonoperating interest income (expense).

acct_label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

acct_label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
acct_description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

acct_label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Gross
acct_description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of completed merchandise or goods expected to be sold within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Net of Reserves
acct_description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods held by the company that are readily available for sale.

acct_label: Inventory, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.

acct_label: Inventory, LIFO Reserve
acct_description: Amount by which inventory stated at last-in first-out (LIFO) is less than (in excess of) inventory stated at other inventory cost methods.

acct_label: Inventory, Net
acct_description: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Inventory, Raw Materials, Gross
acct_description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of raw materials expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Supplies, Gross
acct_description: Gross amount of unprocessed materials to be used in manufacturing or production process and supplies that will be consumed.

acct_label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Supplies, Net of Reserves
acct_description: Aggregated amount of unprocessed materials to be used in manufacturing or production process and supplies that will be consumed. This amount is net of valuation reserves and adjustments.

acct_label: Inventory, Work in Process, Gross
acct_description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of merchandise or goods in the production process expected to be completed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

acct_label: Inventory, Work in Process, Net of Reserves
acct_description: Carrying amount, net of reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or goods which are partially completed. This inventory is generally comprised of raw materials, labor and factory overhead costs, which require further materials, labor and overhead to be converted into finished goods, and which generally require the use of estimates to determine percentage complete and pricing.

acct_label: Investment Income, Interest
acct_description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

acct_label: Investments, Fair Value Disclosure
acct_description: Fair value portion of investment securities, including, but not limited to, marketable securities, derivative financial instruments, and investments accounted for under the equity method.

acct_label: Lease, Cost
acct_description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
acct_description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

acct_label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
